text: 4.3: Sng 66.18; Ais 1.15; Mai 3.4; Sek 7.13; 1 Zo 3.22Nde vhɨra bigɨna ndir zav, ana nzuav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav, anan nzav nde mba bigɨna ndi fhu. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, nde ndɨkndɨgi nzerara kav, Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav, anan nzai fhuvara. Nde wari wo ndavi vheri vuzvugar, nde nta ndir zav nta ndɨkndɨgi.
